content: casual and satisfying knitting for the in-between times brief intermission is a bandana cowl knit from the point up starting back and forth then transitioning to in-the-round before finishing up garter stitch paired with slip stitches all the way the design is engineered without any flipping of the working yarn from front to back you ll thank me brief intermission works up quickly in worsted weight the pattern is adapted easily to other gauge yarns make a worsted one first yarn manos alegria grande 197 yds 100g 75% superwash merino 25% nylon - 1 skein materials needles us #8 24 circular stitch marker tape measure gauge pre-blocked 18 sts and 22 row over 4 in pattern stitch slip_stitch over garter st finished measurements 28 circumference 14 high note this pattern is engineered so that you re not flipping your working yarn back and forth from from back to front for slip stitches you re doing the slip row blind with the wrong side facing you occasionally check that your slip floats are making a brick pattern if you get off pattern check that you ve increased at the beginning and end of each wrong side row the rest row is a great place to rip back to if that becomes necessary
